page.title: 06Pampisford Rd. Area
page.content: Some of the houses in our area are very large indeed. They could be called mansions and were probably built before the First World War. Most of these do not have a family;they are homes for old people or nurses and one is an orphanage. Some of these big houses are being knocked down. More modern houses (built in the 1930's) are still large and expensive (up to 100,000 pounds), because it is a beautiful area. There are often two garages because many people have more than one car. There are some quiet cul-de-sacs with small houses which have been built recently. Some people have sold their back gardens to builders,perhaps because the gardens are too big and they cant be bothered to mow the lawn or plant flowers. By Cumnor House School
